name: AverageNumberOfCigarettesSmokedPerDay
title: Average Number of Cigarettes Smoked Per Day
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that  that are used to assess the average number of cigarettes a patient smokes per day. It includes assessment of on average, what the number of cigarettes a patient smoke per day is.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment, Performed. The intent of this data element is to assess the average number of cigarettes a patient smokes per day.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with LOINC codes identifying assessment of the average number of cigarettes a patient smokes per day,),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: On the number of days you reported you smoked cigarettes during the past 30 days, how many cigarettes did you smoke per day, on average [PhenX]
How many cigarettes do you smoke per day now [PhenX]
On the average of the entire time you smoked, how many cigarettes did you smoke per day [PhenX]
